seo.description: Kaféer med stabilt Wi-Fi, eluttag och rekommenderade tider för att jobba i Positano.

linkLabel: Wi-Fi och arbetsvänliga kaféer nära Brikette
intro: Cafés near the hostel with workable Wi‑Fi. Etiquette: buy regularly, avoid long calls indoors, and keep a small footprint.

sections.title: Spots near Brikette
body: Small cafés on Via Pasitea and around Chiesa Nuova often have stable Wi‑Fi.
Bring a battery pack; power outlets are limited in older venues.

sections.title: Backup connectivity
body: Keep an eSIM as a fallback; carriers vary by area — TIM/Vodafone usually strong.
Tether when the lunchtime rush slows café networks.

a: Buy every 60–90 minutes and avoid peak lunch; consider rotating venues.
